min_x.description: Minimum x value of the crop box [m]

min_y.description: Minimum y value of the crop box [m]

min_z.description: Minimum z value of the crop box [m]

max_x.description: Maximum x value of the crop box [m]

max_y.description: Maximum y value of the crop box [m]

max_z.description: Maximum z value of the crop box [m]

negative.description: If false, keep points inside the box. If true, keep points outside the box.

output_point_xyzircaedt.description: Force output to PointXYZIRCAEDT format for continuous CUDA processing. If false, outputs PointXYZIRC format for Autoware .

max_mem_pool_size_in_byte.description: Maximum size of GPU memory pool [bytes]
